text:
Veteran actor Sharmila Tagore could not cross the Wagah Border into India on Sunday as Pakistan’s Federal Investigation Agency Immigration stopped her for not having a ‘police report’ of her stay in Lahore.

Lahore Lit Fest

Ms. Tagore, who had come here on a four-day visit to participate in the Lahore Literary Festival (LLF), was escorted by police to get to the Wagah Border.

The (Pakistan) Punjab government had given her ‘official protocol’ after her meeting with Prime Minister Nawaz Sharif. However, when she reached the Wagah Border, the immigration officials told her that ‘police report’ was missing from her travel documents.

On Ms. Tagore’s inquiry that “can’t I go with this document?”, the immigration official said ‘No’. — PTI
title: Sharmila Tagore denied entry at Wagah border
